markdownEnumDescriptions: Automatically close unused tabs in all workspaces, except the workspaces present in the Excluded list.
Automatically close unused tabs only in the workspaces present in the Included list.
autoclosetabs.activation.markdownDescription:
`everywhere-except-excluded`: automatically close unused tabs in all workspaces, except the workspaces present in the Excluded list.

`nowhere-except-included`: automatically close unused tabs only in the workspaces present in the Included list.

autoclosetabs.excludedWorkspaces.markdownDescription: List of workspaces in which unused tabs will not be automatically closed. Only used when `autoclosetabs.activation` is equal to `everywhere-except-excluded`.

autoclosetabs.includedWorkspaces.markdownDescription: List of workspaces in which unused tabs will be automatically closed. Only used when `autoclosetabs.activation` is equal to `nowhere-except-included`.

autoclosetabs.numberOfTabsInGroup.markdownDescription: Unused tabs will be closed only if the number of tabs in the group is greater than this number; enter `0` to close all unused tabs.

autoclosetabs.tabAgeForAutomaticClosing.markdownDescription: Number of hours after which an unused tab is automatically closed.
